content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. Under the previous order, the Senate will be 
in a period of morning business for debate only until 11 a.m., with 
Senators permitted to speak therein.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text: Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. The clerk will call the roll.
  The senior assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
Mr. SCHUMER. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order 
for the quorum call be rescinded.
content.speaker: Mr. SCHUMER

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
